name: Sobada Belimal
description: Belimal is a well known herb used as herbal tea from ancient times. It has a lovely fragrance and flavour which induces consumption. Regular usage refreshes and alleviates the body from fatigue. No side effects have been reported with the regular use of this herb. Belimal taken one hour before sleep will help to one to relax mentally, which may lead to a peaceful night’s sleep. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
